price: 149. Haddaad u fashaan khayr si caddaan ah ama qarsoodi, ama aad iska cafidaan xume- haddaba Alle waa Cafis Badane, Awood Badan.
arabic: إِن تُبۡدُواْ خَيۡرًا أَوۡ تُخۡفُوهُ أَوۡ تَعۡفُواْ عَن سُوٓءٖ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ عَفُوّٗا قَدِيرًا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: in tub'dū khayran aw tukh'fūhu aw taʿfū ʿan sūin fa-inna al-laha kāna ʿafuwwan qadīran
